data.text:
It's a crazy lineup, huh!? I was just my usual wicked self and 
the word spread like wildfire☆
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>It's a crazy lineup, huh!? I was just my usual wicked self and 
<story>the word spread like wildfire☆

data.text:
Oguri-paisen, Ban-chamu, Yae-mero…… 
Kuuuu～ it really gets you fired up!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Oguri-paisen, Ban-chamu, Yae-mero…… 
<story>Kuuuu～ it really gets you fired up!

data.text:
Anyway, it means this race is gonna be extra spicy! 
Uhyaa, I'm pysched～☆ Crazy～☆
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Anyway, it means this race is gonna be extra spicy! 
<story>Uhyaa, I'm pysched～☆ Crazy～☆

data.text:
Daitaku Helios hadn't even debuted yet. No matter how much 
hidden talent she had, against experienced opponents like this……
data.processed:
<story>Daitaku Helios hadn't even debuted yet. No matter how much 
<story>hidden talent she had, against experienced opponents like this……

data.text:
Don't be such a downer～. 
'Sides, looky there!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Don't be such a downer～. 
<story>'Sides, looky there!

data.text:
Uwa, seriously!? Helios-chan's runnin' in a mock race 
that looks like a G1. So the group LANE wasn't lying……
data.name: Friend A
data.processed:
<story>Uwa, seriously!? Helios-chan's runnin' in a mock race 
<story>that looks like a G1. So the group LANE wasn't lying……

data.text:
Really, I have no idea what that girl's thinking…… But, an 
opportunity like this doesn't come around often. I need to 
properly analyze it!
data.name: Mid-rank Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>Really, I have no idea what that girl's thinking…… But, an 
<story>opportunity like this doesn't come around often. I need to 
<story>properly analyze it!

data.text:
Helios～～～～!! You're our Blitz Captain～～!! 
You better not lose to them when it comes to guts～～～～!!
data.name: Friend B
data.processed:
<story>Helios～～～～!! You're our Blitz Captain～～!! 
<story>You better not lose to them when it comes to guts～～～～!!

data.text: Oh yeah! Just watch me～☆
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed: <story>Oh yeah! Just watch me～☆

data.text:
See? They're all chompin' at the bit too! 
Got no choice but to take the reins!!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>See? They're all chompin' at the bit too! 
<story>Got no choice but to take the reins!!

data.text:
'Sides, results? 
―We won't know 'til it's over!!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>'Sides, results? 
<story>―We won't know 'til it's over!!

data.text:
Well, just sit back and relax～! 
Heli-poyo is gonna knock this Wei～ outta the park☆ Let's go!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Well, just sit back and relax～! 
<story>Heli-poyo is gonna knock this Wei～ outta the park☆ Let's go!

data.text:
If she's like that in front of this line up, 
then just maybe…… that means she was confident 
enough that she purposefully gathered them!
data.processed:
<story>If she's like that in front of this line up, 
<story>then just maybe…… that means she was confident 
<story>enough that she purposefully gathered them!

data.text: ―Hell yeah, pedal to the metal～～～～!!!!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed: <story>―Hell yeah, pedal to the metal～～～～!!!!

data.text:
Ooooooh……!? Daitaku Helios leapt out in front! 
And she just keeps on accelerating……!
data.name: Rookie Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>Ooooooh……!? Daitaku Helios leapt out in front! 
<story>And she just keeps on accelerating……!

data.text:
Daitaku Helios was running at a speed that seemed like she wasn't 
even thinking about pacing herself, she just continued to pull 
further ahead. And that's not all――
data.processed:
<story>Daitaku Helios was running at a speed that seemed like she wasn't 
<story>even thinking about pacing herself, she just continued to pull 
<story>further ahead. And that's not all――

data.text:
Gyahahaa, keep it up Helios!! 
Red-line it～～～～!
data.name: Friend B
data.processed:
<story>Gyahahaa, keep it up Helios!! 
<story>Red-line it～～～～!

data.text:
You got it～～!! 
You better kick it up over there too～～～～!! Ahahaa!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>You got it～～!! 
<story>You better kick it up over there too～～～～!! Ahahaa!

data.text:
She's got enough leeway…… to hold a conversation!? That girl, 
don't tell me…… she's seriously planning to run away with this? 
Against those opponents……!?
data.name: Rookie Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>She's got enough leeway…… to hold a conversation!? That girl, 
<story>don't tell me…… she's seriously planning to run away with this? 
<story>Against those opponents……!?

data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed: <story>―I～～～～～ caaaaan't～～～～!!!!

data.text: Aaaaaaaah～……
data.name: Everyone
data.processed: <story>Aaaaaaaah～……

data.text: In the end, she couldn't recover from that……
data.processed: <story>In the end, she couldn't recover from that……

data.text:
Zeeeeh…… Haaa…… Ugh, gonna puke…… 
And I was last～…… Haa～～…… Seriously, seriously―
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Zeeeeh…… Haaa…… Ugh, gonna puke…… 
<story>And I was last～…… Haa～～…… Seriously, seriously―

data.text: ―Seriously, that was hilarious!! Wahahaha～!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed: <story>―Seriously, that was hilarious!! Wahahaha～!

data.text:
I really wanted to push through to the end though～. 
Knew it, I just didn't have the stamina! Fuha☆
data.name: Daitaku Helios

choices.text: You had no chance from the start!?
You had no chance from the start!?

data.processed:
<story>I really wanted to push through to the end though～. 
<story>Knew it, I just didn't have the stamina! Fuha☆

data.text:
Yeah, there was no way! But, I had a blast!♪ 
I just love racing～! Good work, me! Good work everyone～!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, there was no way! But, I had a blast!♪ 
<story>I just love racing～! Good work, me! Good work everyone～!

data.text:
Haa, I was worried there. Daitaku Helios…… Fufuu, what an 
interesting girl. But, well…… teaming up with her…… is a bit much.
data.name: Rookie Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>Haa, I was worried there. Daitaku Helios…… Fufuu, what an 
<story>interesting girl. But, well…… teaming up with her…… is a bit much.

data.text:
Talking to the spectators during the race…… it's almost like she 
has no ability to focus. A girl that only wants to perform, I 
wouldn't want to face her……
data.name: Mid-rank Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>Talking to the spectators during the race…… it's almost like she 
<story>has no ability to focus. A girl that only wants to perform, I 
<story>wouldn't want to face her……

data.text:
Helios, you really are insane～! You gotta do something fun like 
this again. Haven't you been offline kind of often lately?
data.name: Friend B
data.processed:
<story>Helios, you really are insane～! You gotta do something fun like 
<story>this again. Haven't you been offline kind of often lately?

data.text:
I have～!! We should fix that! 
LANE me!! See ya～☆
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>I have～!! We should fix that! 
<story>LANE me!! See ya～☆

data.text:
She had just come in last, but I didn't sense any sense of 
frustration from Daitaku Helios at all. Of course, she was 
probably down about it, but……

choices.text: Um, aren't you…… a little upset?
Um, aren't you…… a little upset?

data.processed:
<story>She had just come in last, but I didn't sense any sense of 
<story>frustration from Daitaku Helios at all. Of course, she was 
<story>probably down about it, but……

data.text:
Ahahaa, about that～! 
Nope, not one bit☆
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Ahahaa, about that～! 
<story>Nope, not one bit☆

data.text:
Well, it would have been awesome if I won! 
Losing isn't gonna pull me down, though. No regrets!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Well, it would have been awesome if I won! 
<story>Losing isn't gonna pull me down, though. No regrets!

data.text:
I mean, it was super fun, right!? Everyone was all smiles! 
And I was～ awesome! Ain't nothing to be down about～, right!?
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>I mean, it was super fun, right!? Everyone was all smiles! 
<story>And I was～ awesome! Ain't nothing to be down about～, right!?

data.text:
It wasn't a front at all, she, from the bottom of 
her heart…… was laughing. I never thought I'd meet 
a student here that was so outside the norm.
data.processed:
<story>It wasn't a front at all, she, from the bottom of 
<story>her heart…… was laughing. I never thought I'd meet 
<story>a student here that was so outside the norm.

data.text:
Hm? What's up with your palm!? 
Isn't it really red?
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Hm? What's up with your palm!? 
<story>Isn't it really red?

data.text:
When I looked, my fingernails had left marks in my palm. "She 
might win!" ……when I had been thinking that, I must have 
unintentionally clenched my fists.

choices.text: (Right, I was excited for her. But……)

data.processed:
<story>When I looked, my fingernails had left marks in my palm. "She 
<story>might win!" ……when I had been thinking that, I must have 
<story>unintentionally clenched my fists.

data.text:
……Ah, I just remembered something! 
We were talking about contracts, right? What do you want to do―
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>……Ah, I just remembered something! 
<story>We were talking about contracts, right? What do you want to do―

data.text:
Yo, Heli～! We're heading to a family 
restaurant with Jordan, wanna come～?
data.name: Friend C
data.processed:
<story>Yo, Heli～! We're heading to a family 
<story>restaurant with Jordan, wanna come～?

data.text: I'll go――!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed: <story>I'll go――!

data.text: Hnya?
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed: <story>Hnya?

data.text:
I had gotten to see her run but, I still didn't have a clear 
understanding of her. At the very least, I wanted to hear what 
she wanted to focus on―

choices.text: Do you have a dream you want to fulfill?
choices.processed: <size=41>Do you have a dream you want to fulfill?</size>

choices.text: Do you have a dream you want to fulfill?
choices.processed: <size=41>Do you have a dream you want to fulfill?</size>

data.processed:
<story>I had gotten to see her run but, I still didn't have a clear 
<story>understanding of her. At the very least, I wanted to hear what 
<story>she wanted to focus on―

data.text:
A never-ending festival! 
Byeeee～☆
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>A never-ending festival! 
<story>Byeeee～☆

data.text:
―Her run was very promising. She could probably 
make big things happen, that's what I felt. But……
data.processed:
<story>―Her run was very promising. She could probably 
<story>make big things happen, that's what I felt. But……

data.text:
There was no good or bad when it came to dreams. 
But if I was going to be her trainer, I wanted 
her to be able to aim for it seriously.
data.processed:
<story>There was no good or bad when it came to dreams. 
<story>But if I was going to be her trainer, I wanted 
<story>her to be able to aim for it seriously.

data.text:
A clash of serious emotions was what made races awe-inspiring. 
With the way she is now, I couldn't sense any sense of 
"seriousness" in her……

choices.text: (I need to know more about her)

data.processed:
<story>A clash of serious emotions was what made races awe-inspiring. 
<story>With the way she is now, I couldn't sense any sense of 
<story>"seriousness" in her……

data.text:
And so, on the next day off. I went in to the city to find 
Daitaku Helios…… I found her almost immediately, and she seemed 
to be in a good mood.
data.processed:
<story>And so, on the next day off. I went in to the city to find 
<story>Daitaku Helios…… I found her almost immediately, and she seemed 
<story>to be in a good mood.

data.text:
Oh! You came at just the right time! 
You free? Wanna dance!?
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
<story>Oh! You came at just the right time! 
<story>You free? Wanna dance!?

title: Besides, Life Is Meant To Be Lived
